name: Eric Trueheart
info:
• 别名: Eric Parker Trueheart
  • 性别: 男

  • 引用来源: https://www.simonandschuster.com/authors/Eric-Trueheart/140265641
detail: Eric Trueheart was one of the original writers on the Invader ZIM television series back when there was a thing called “television.” Since then, he’s made a living writing moderately-inappropriate things for people who make entertainment for children, including Dreamworks Animation, Cartoon Network, Disney TV, PBS, Hasbro and others. Upon reading this list, he now thinks he maybe should have become a dentist, and he hates teeth.
